long_description: The reversible Patagonia Flippin' Beanie hat features attractive graphics inside and out to adapt to your ever-changing mood. Stretchy nylon/wool blend has a soft hand that is comfortable next to skin. Reversible design of the Patagonia Flippin' Beanie hat gives you 2 looks to choose from. 1 size fits most.
short_description: The reversible Patagonia Flippin' Beanie hat features attractive graphics inside and out to adapt to your ever-changing mood.
